about.description: Peihwa Primary School is committed to providing quality education in a nurturing and inclusive environment. We believe in developing well-rounded students who excel academically, socially, and emotionally.
about.missionText: Sustaining a quality education system to develop individual potential and fulfill national aspirations.
about.visionText: Quality Education, Quality Citizens, A Prosperous Nation

charter.title: Client Charter
items: We will provide quality education to students to produce a group of excellent citizens with high moral values who meet national goals.
We will strive to improve student achievement levels in both academic and co-curricular fields.
We will ensure the health and safety of students while they are at school.
We will create a conducive learning environment by providing perfect teaching and learning facilities.
We are ready to provide fast and friendly service to all parents who deal with the school.
The administration is ready to solve all problems related to the school.
